name: v4.0
body:
First release versioned the same as the original to keep it coherent

- Collada support
- MD2 support
- Obj-Importer: obj-homogeneous_coords support

name: Ply
body: Ply Format complete

name: .obj import complete
body:
.obj import complete

materials include also texture properties (name, clamp, etc..)

name: STL and OBJ
body:
- first support for STL and OBJ importing
- format detection (extentionless) is not yet implemented
- exporting is not yet implemented
- post-processing flags yet to implement
